author: ThrillSeeker
description:
Hello and welcome to TUESDAY NEWSDAY! Your number one resource for the entire week's worth of VR news! All Meta hardware gets a complete over haul of the UI (within Horizon OS), the Quest 4 and 4S are reportedly CANCELED.. and in its place.. a new headset that looks much.. much more impressive. Also.. Palmer Luckey is back in XR AND forming partnerships with Meta? 

Buckle up for a wild week. 

I hope you enjoyed!
title: Wow. Meta JUST Changed Its Entire VR Strategy.
